name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Charles J. GALLO, Appellant

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Charles J. GALLO, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Order affirmed.
LARSEN and ZAPPALA, JJ., dissent.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Paul J. Winterhalter, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Andrea F. McKenna, Deputy Atty. Gen., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
574 A.2d 602
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Charles J. GALLO, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued May 11, 1990.
Decided May 23, 1990.
Paul J. Winterhalter, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Andrea F. McKenna, Deputy Atty. Gen., for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, JJ.
